Reviews.Title: A quality product that works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Karl Keller
Reviews.Content: Since receiving this product five days ago, I've put the pen thru its paces and with the exception of one issue (see below), everything works as advertised.PROs:  - This is a very nice feeling pen  - It's a little bigger (as in thickness) than the pens I'm normally used to but not to the point of feeling awkward in the hand.  - The picture quality is good considering the size of the pen and believe is great considering the cost and size of the pen  - The video is a little hazier than I would have liked but still considering everything is very good  - The audio was clear and didn't have any problems understanding conversationsCONs:  - My biggest complaint is the instructions on how to set the time and date (#7) were very confusing and I haven't been able to get it changed so far.  This is the ONLY reason I didn't give the pen a rating of 5.  If I'm able to figure this issue out and actually be able to make the changes I will post an update and would have no problem changing my rating to a 5.  - This is a little nit picky but the grammar isn't the best and could be improved.  Not a show stopper to purchasing the pen by any means but it made reading some of the instructions a little choppy.  - Not a Con per se, but make sure that whatever is behind the pen is not shiny or reflective as the light when it blinks can be seen, especially in dim or dark conditions  One note of caution, be aware of what the laws are where you are when you choose to use the pen when not everyone knows they're being videotaped/recorded.  In some locations, it's legal to record an event when only one of the parties present knows while other locations (States), require ALL parties to be told that they're being videotaped/recorded.  Overall... I really like this product and would recommend anyone looking for something like this. If I can change the time and date this pen would be home run.  Until I can figure out how to do that, it's a triple.============================UPDATE: June 5, 2013  After failing to figure out how to set the time and date I finally sent an email to Adfilic asking for some help.  They were awesome in responding to my question.  I believe that any response in less than 24 hours is great... well, I got mine in less than 2 hours.  Customer Service, not to mention the answer to my question, has changed my review from a 4 to a 5!!!  I've cut and pasted the response I got regarding how to change the time and date.  I'm sure most other people were able to figure it out by themselves but for those that are instruction-challenged like me, here you are:"To change the time and date, you first have to connect the USB cable to both the pen and computer. Once you've done that a USB hard drive will appear in your computer. In the hard drive you will find a text file labeled as time. Open it and type in the year, month, day, time then click save under the file tab. Close it and unplug the USB cable and the date and time should be changed."

Reviews.Title: Best Spy Camera - No other comes even close!
Reviews.Author: Edgar J
Reviews.Content: I've tried several other spy cameras over the past year just for entertainment and I have to say the quality just doesn't match this Spy Pen Camera. The lightweight and stylish form is one of a kind and blows the competition because this one just is obviously better crafted and of higher quality.This Spy Pen Camera even has a tiny dvr recorder that supports 16gb SD card I have and was easier than any other to use. I do not recommend you drop it but as a matter of fact this little gadget fell out of my child's hand and to my surprise did not break. That is obviously a plus I did not expect but can live with.has multiple functionsAnother thing is after I use the video camcorder, I playback the footage on my laptop and since I love to use it for still images, the images are all very crisp and clear plus the video is even better with the quality in picture and sound.I am glad I set eyes on this Spy pen camera and appreciate the fact that it has way surpassed my initial expectations and has delivered considerably more that I could imagine-could you believe that it includes the usb cable also which without would have cost me a long trip to the mall. I'm starting to love this spy pen camera and actually have it on me all day because of it's easy portability and discrete nature.If you're on the fence or simply undecided on purchasing a spy pen camera then I sincerely believe your worries are over with this one; it's compact, lightweight, easy to handle, discrete, durable and low price are what makes it stand out above and beyond the competition. Last but not least, I feel comfort that if for some reason it stopped working I can get a refund. So I've got nothing to lose with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: This Is The Real Deal
Reviews.Author: Kevin Townes
Reviews.Content: In the past few months, I've tried a number of these so-called "Spy Pen Cams".  I'm a gadget guy and enjoy playing with these things for fun.  Most of the others ones I've tried are toys.  They don't work properly or they are cheaply made.  Not this one!  The Adfilic Spy Pen is awesome. Reviews.Title: Great for my work with the CIA!

Reviews.Title: Unobtrusive and works great
Reviews.Author: Deeahn Johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought this spycam to document neglect that my mom is experiencing in a nursing home.  I've filed numerous complaints with the facility and the Long Term Care Ombudsman, but the staff lie to cover up their poor performance and nothing changes.I had a bit of trouble understanding how to get the device into "standby" mode, so I emailed the seller.  He was extremely helpful and polite, answering my emails within minutes.  He sent me a quick-start guide that shows exactly, step-by-step, how to charge the unit, set the time and use it.  I'm not the most tech-savvy person, but these directions were simple and easy to follow.My first pictures were a bit blurry, but I think that's because I was trying to focus on something too close.  The pictures turned out much better at a distance of 12 inches or more.  The video was very clear.  I don't think the quality is quite what I've come to think of as high definition, but it's certainly more than adequate for my needs.  I wouldn't expect it to look like something recorded with an expensive movie camera and studio lighting.  Aiming the device is slightly challenging, but I believe it just takes a bit of practice.A note to consider:  be sure you're aware of the laws in the state where you're planning to use this item.  I know that my state doesn't allow audio recording unless one party is aware of being recorded.  That works for us, because mom and I will be the ones using the device.  It just means I couldn't leave it recording in her room without her consent.Overall, I'm very pleased with my purchase of the iPenCam and I believe it will allow me to obtain evidence that can't be ignored.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Customer Service - Replacement sent fast with no problem
Reviews.Author: Tahlulah Banana
Reviews.Content: I got this camera pen for myself for cause it looked like a fun "toy" to get just for kicks as a birthday present to myself.  When it arrived, I went to set it up, but was concerned cause I have three computers (Windows 2002 XP, Vista, and Windows 7) and the box said it required 2000 XP.  Well I tried it but it did not work - booo.  The light came on, but I got an error message on all three of my computers.  I thought it was the operating system, so I wrote to the seller to find out if there was a software upgrade for it.  The seller was super helpful and gave me some tips which I tried.  Then had more questions, so I wrote again and they gave me more info, both times responding pretty quickly to my surprise.  Here's some info that other buyers should know:- The pen DOES WORK on newer PC operating systems, including Windows 7.- Make sure the mini-SD memory card is pushed all the way in the slot.  Mine was not in all the way and it went in at least 1/16" more and made a click/snap sound.- Plug it into the USB port on the BACK of the computer, instead of one in the front (I'd heard this regarding other USB attachments because apparently the front USB ports have a lower charge - I don't know what's up with that and it doesn't make any sense to me since those are more convenient, but whatever).- Make sure a light comes on.  If not, press the button at the top (duh, felt stupid about missing that one).- If a light still doesn't come on, it might be a defective cable.  The cable is fine if a red or green light comes on.- Red light means it's charging.  The first time you plug the pen into your computer, you have to download some software and you can do that when the battery is charging.  It doesn't have to be fully charged (green light) to download it.- If you check the SD card, plug it in the back USB port, the light comes on (meaning the cable is fine), but you get an error message saying, "USB Device Not Recognized" - then unfortunately, the pen is most likely broken or defective.Since I work in quality control, I know that defective items are a normal part of the manufacturing process.  I read some reviews here that people thought the item itself was horrible because it didn't work, but honestly they just got a bad one.  If I got a damaged item from Target or Walmart, I wouldn't call it a rip off, I'd exchange for one that works.  So that's what I did.  But I notice that when people buy stuff online, it's like they feel personally attacked or something.  Geez, just let the seller know - afterall, they can't test every single item they sell.So, after doing the things I listed above, I told the seller about the error message.  They understood the problem immediately and confirmed the pen was probably defective and unable to recognize the SD card.  They apologized and said they'd send me a new pen right away.  It was probably the easiest and best experience I've had with an online seller.Happy Ending:  I got my new pen within a week and it worked right off the bat.  It really is a neat little toy and my nephew and I had a lot of fun pretending to be spies.  The quality of the video and audio was surprisingly good for such a tiny camera hole, so calling it a "toy" doesn't do it justice.  It's a fun item and I'm very happy with it, and especially how great the seller was about everything.

Reviews.Title: Secret Agent Man

Reviews.Content: This thing is awesome! I mean, I'm sitting here typing this, giggling to myself and I'm darn-near 57 yrs old-! Reviews.Title: Love my new spy pen, but the instructions need some work
Reviews.Author: Ranch Cook
Reviews.Content: About 2 weeks ago I received my spy pen, then went to a local store and got a 16gb micro card.  All ready to get things going I dove into getting this camera cranked up... but the instructions didn't deliver what I had hoped for.  Taking pictures was fine, but getting the video figured out took a little work as my interpretation of what was written just didn't produce results for recording.  So, I contacted the seller and they were quick to respond to my inquiry and assist, which was very nice.Hopefully they will redo the instructions soon, or post improved directions online with a link in one of their follow up "tips" emails that they send after purchase.For those that get the same instructions I got, here is what I found was needed to get the pen to take pics and record:Once the unit is on in Camera mode:To take picture, press top button once quickly, then release (as the instructions say)To shut off, press until 3 green blinks followed by red blink, then release (likewise, as instructions say)To record in video (when on and in camera mode), press top button until you see the first green blink, release button immediately (green light will continue to blink for total of 3 times, but there will be NO red blink), light just goes dark, but video is now recording. (Instructions indicate the light will blink slowly while recording, but my light didn't blink at all)To shut off video, press top button until you see a green blink followed by a red blinkIf the instructions had been better written and saved a little aggravation I would have given this a 5 star rating since I love using this little rascal.  So handy to be able to carry around a video camera in your pocket totally discreetly and with such a light weight.  You never know when you might want to document something on a casual basis.  Oh, and the quality of the pics and video is pretty good as long as you have reasonable lighting and don't move around too much, just as with any camera.  Great product.

Plus, together, it only took about 45 minutes of "video" and then stopped.  Battery was still good and there was plenty of room left on the memory card, so I'm not sure what the problem was.I've used these pens before and all of them are cheap, but this one performs the worst of the ones I've used.  I guess it's hit or miss on what you get.  I'll try to exchange it and see what happens.  If they let me return it (it's been a month or so due to holiday business) and the new one works, I'll amend this review.

Reviews.Title: "THE BEST SPY CAMERA!!!
Reviews.Author: Menkar
Reviews.Content: Wow! This is the coolest gadget I've ever owned. It's so much fun. I'm not really a tech geek, but it does everything as advertised. It takes great pics and amazing video, and the pen works great too.It's really easy to use and store your videos. I highly recommend this product. You will love it

Reviews.Title: bad angle
Reviews.Author: Indyman
Reviews.Content: The picture and sound were really good but with it clipped to my shirt pocket the camera would barely capture the top of peoples heads. And I'm only 5'6".

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tool For Any Business
Reviews.Author: Holly Fullingim
Reviews.Content: This Pocket Pen Camera is an excellent tool for your sales Team, or just plain fun.  I purchased the Pocket Pen Camera to help me on sales calls.  It records tons of videos and voice, and also will take still pictures.  I use it to video Tape my sales conversations with my customers, but only with their permission, and them knowing I am taping the sales call. When I return to the office i review the footage.  I also found out that this helps me to improve my presentations.

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: John M Telesh
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd try at a pen cam.  I thought this one would be better based on the reviews.  No luck.  Video would start and stop. Then the pen would not turn on like before, just flash a red warning light.  I sent it back, spent more for a reliable brand and I have been happy ever since.  What I learned, you get what you pay for. If you want anything half way decent, expect to pay close to or over $100 or do not even bother

Reviews.Content: It seemed to work, but I could not find any support to answer some operational questions, so I returned it.

Reviews.Title: great tool
Reviews.Author: Dominic
Reviews.Content: everything advertised is what it is.  I would recommended it. surprised that it came in a nice good quality pen, looks expensive.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: For the price, you can't beat it.  The pen takes pretty decent videos and photos.I had an issue with mine, but the merchant responded to my email immediately and sent me newone. Hey, stuff happens, ya know?  Anyway, other than the horrible directions, the pen isa pretty neat gadget.  Fortunately, the merchant knows how the pen operates and is veryresponsive to questions.

Reviews.Title: Alright camera
Reviews.Author: april
Reviews.Content: When I first got the camera it worked great. Then all of a sudden it kept saying my videos were corrupt. Or sure why but I switched the ad card and so far no issues with that. It also breaks the videos down into separate ones and I'm not sure how to fix it. I guess it's good for the price and I'm not sure how to use the for feature. No instructions came with it but a simple youtube search and I found it in less than a minute: overall it's ok and works :)

Reviews.Title: Terrific Pen & Awesome SpyCam!
Reviews.Author: Natosha S. Miller
Reviews.Content: First, there are many on the market and none, I have tried yet has held up well compared to this one!The Spy Pen Camera and Tiny DVR is the most fun you could have with a pen. It provides a great quality digital video recorder and comes with a free 8gb SD card, which this pen can hold up to 16gbs. Unfortunately, Most Spy Pens don't provide the SD card for saving and capturing the moments your taking. However, this Spy Pen does!Charging light is on, plugged into computer with the USB cord.The hidden camera gives you a great viewing of the video seen on the computer, after you record. The pen takes a great length of 320 minutes of video footage and you can save up to 48,000 photos on this pen when using a 16 gb SD micro card. The format is AVI which is perfect for everyone who wants to share their videos and pictures right away. One thing, you won't have any problem setting this Spy Pen up! I was easily able to spy on my family without them evening noticing, and connecting it to my laptop with the USB cord( included).The footage was wonderful and It really can take everything heard around the room and mentioned when I was spying. After attaching it to your computer or taking the SD card and placing it into a reader,  you'll be able to share these videos and photos with others on your favorite social networks and through email.The manual you receive is easy to read and simple to setting your Spy CamPen up. The USB cord also acts as the charger, so once your pen is losing power you just plug it in your computer's USB slot and it's charging again.This pen has been given pretty good ratings all the time by everyone who uses it. It is top of the line and not your child's toy! You will be impressed with this product and with my full honesty, you won't be disappointed! I really think it's fun and a creative techy gadget that everyone should enjoy!This absolutely changed my opinion to small cameras being functional as a real life camera. You can see a full viewing of the recording and no flashing light to give the person beside you a strange look. You can now video record your doctors, your teachers, or anyone that is either doing something bad or maybe just so you can remember something that were mentioned to you.

Reviews.Content: i usually dont leave any feed back like this..but!!!they have the near customer service!just go with this one!

Reviews.Content: Can't figure out how to use it, not easy at all, not happy ! Don't waste your money on this.

Reviews.Title: It works pretty well
Reviews.Author: Chris white
Reviews.Content: The first one did not hold a charge but the second one worked as it should the video works pretty well for a small lens

Reviews.Title: Good seller, OK product.
Reviews.Author: Eric Goforth
Reviews.Content: These pens are definitely mass-produced over in China, and as such have a significant 'dead on arrival' rate.  The first pen I ordered was indeed DOA, but after notifying Adfilic, they sent a replacement out without any drama.The second pen does work fine --  I wish the resolution was a little better, but it's a good option in the price range.I imagine all of the alternatives available here on Amazon suffer the same failure rates, so you might as well go with a seller who will take care of it for you if you get a bad one.

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: Gerald Shahdan
Reviews.Content: the cam works great, but the audio isn't very clear. Also the clip that clips on your shirt broke off the first time I used it. They need a better design there. Fixing the correct time also was a hassle figuring out. Need better instructions on that. All in all a pretty cool lil device

It turns on, green light turns to flashing red and it shuts itself off. Don't know if the camera itself works or not, never even got that far. Do not waste your money on this

Reviews.Content: It's simply wonderful.  It does. what. it's supposed. to do. Video is clear, sound it's perfect and picture quality is very good. I'm very happy with it. And what is even nicer is the delivery, I ordered. on Wednesday. night. and arrived on mid day Friday. I think that anybody will be happy with this pen.

Reviews.Title: It is not working.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I tried a couple of times to turn on and record by holding 2~5 seconds. but it always turned off.Turning off and starting recording are identical? I need your help immediately.

Reviews.Title: Does not work properly
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I took it out of the box, charged it as per instructions. Windows recognized the mass storage unit so I took a test video. Windows 7 could not open it, said it was missing a codec. Tried it on a Win Vista and XP box to no avail. Tried getting some support but there was none available that I could find. I went online and found a codec pack and was able to open the video all 30 seconds of it. I've tried numerous times and can only record 30 seconds of video. This thing has been a headache. I'm going to try replacing the SD card......Ok went out and bought a brand name 16 gig SD card. It's working! Good video nice pics but what a pain in the A.. I think a little bit of support would have saved me a lot of time. I wouldn't recommend this unless you're willing to spend some time and money to get it to work properly. 4/20 UPDATE Pen stopped working altogether, Fortunately it was within the 30 days. Sent it back to Amazon for a refund. I'm done. I don't even want to try another one.

Reviews.Title: New and warranty
Reviews.Author: Jason Downey
Reviews.Content: It does what it says! I like it so far. I have used it 4 times now. I will keep you guys posted on how long it holds up. Not really a cheaply made one either.

Reviews.Title: Limited record time
Reviews.Author: Eric S. Allen
Reviews.Content: When I found this item on Amazon I was very intrigued.  I needed a way to be able to record meetings without needing to carry around a large camera.The quality of the videos are rather good for such a small space.  The problems I have had are that the battery life is so very small that you can only get at most 30 mins of record time from a single charge.  And this is with the charge taking upwards of 8 hours!  Also, like mentioned by others, setting the time for the sake of it providing a proper timestamp is a very difficult process.

Reviews.Title: Worth every cent of fun
Reviews.Author: David Boswell
Reviews.Content: This is a fun thing.  I attach it to my dog, RC cars and just do covert video recordings of things.I like how you can take still pictures too.I'm ready to be a spy now.

Reviews.Title: Sounded great, but was less than I had hoped
Reviews.Author: bestemp
Reviews.Content: While the product description is correct, know that with my particular one, that it worked sparingly. It would not take pictures, and it took videos every 4-5 attempts.A more detail review cannot be posted readily because it did not work long enough for me to gather the patience to continue my usage.I am sure that this item has worked for others in the past, but that just wasn't the case here. IF the situation were different, and it did work, I am certain that I would double the amount of stars.

Reviews.Title: Good choice. good value
Reviews.Author: Hugo Dominguez
Reviews.Content: Item is exactly as described. Setup is straightforward and easy. This is not a toy, feels good and solid. Video and audio quality is good enough for the size of the device. Takes a while to get used to operate it properly. Overall very good product for the price.

Reviews.Title: "AdFilic Spy Pen Camera & Tiny DVR" might be a good product but it is not adapted for Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Reza H.
Reviews.Content: It didn't work with my computer which is "windows 8" (hp Pavilion touchscreen desktop). So, it didn't show any video which I already caught, and my computer was being stuck.

Reviews.Title: Pen Camera No adjustment for Focus
Reviews.Author: BOEDIONO SOERASNO
Reviews.Content: Received The AdFilic Spy Pen Camera one week ago, and right away open the small box.After reading the short manuals on major items, I charged the camera for 4 or 5 hours, then I am ready to test it.For static photo and video recording ( by holding it in your hand), the product works as advertised, but when you used it for moving by clip it in your shirt pocket. The resulting videos is so blurring and unfocus. I understand this is maybe because I am walking or moving too quicly, but walking or moving too slowly, like in 'Slo-Mo', will  looked strange and beat the purpose of the spy cam. The most frustating thing : there is no way you can set the focus of the camera.As for the sound quality it is very good and clear , especially for your own voice, because it is closer to the camera.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Cool
Reviews.Author: blondiegeek
Reviews.Content: This thing is pretty fun. Works as advertised. Instructions could be translated a little better but cool over all. Nice to have recordings of meetings.

Reviews.Title: Spy Pen Camera
Reviews.Author: Miriam
Reviews.Content: I thought this was just too cool. I got it as a gag gift for my brother in law. He's kind of techy and I am not, so I was worried he might not think that it is the real deal or that it would work properly, but it works like a charm and gave him a laugh.I have been a long time shopper at amazon and most of the time things arrive quickly and on time, but alas, not always. We lucked out and this arrived right on time and in perfect condition.If you are looking for a fun gift for a techy person in your life, then consider this spy pen. They'll like it.

The company that sells it has excellent customer service.Cons - The - Video resolution: 1280*960 is not accurate, it is very interpolated and cameras with 640*480 have better resolution. Is poor in low light. The button is to easy to hit and accidently stop recording without you knowing it. The instructions weren't great, but doable.

I watched a video on using the pen and in following precisely the same steps, failed to achieve what the video did (which was turning on the camera or video feature). None of my computers recognized the device either. It could be an issue with the memory card but it seems difficult to find any information on troubleshooting beyond the reasonably useless users manual. Alas I am too lazy to return the item as I already threw away the original packaging and my interest has waned sufficiently that I will not likely try a replacement memory card.
